verbose_text: Per the recommendations of the poison center, the patient was transferred to a pediatric tertiary care hospital, where continuous venovenous hemofiltration (CVVH) was performed with an HF 1,200 filter (Medivators, Inc.) at a flow rate of 100 mL/min for 16.5 h. During CVVH, the renal function improved and the vancomycin level declined to 38.9 mg/L.
